tool.name: Filter by Sample
tool.description: and put into a new VCF file

param.name: samples
param.label: Enter sample IDs (whitespace separated)
param.help: Names must be whitespace separated e.g AT501 AT502 AT503 etc

tool.help:
Filter by sample extracts all the sample ids specified in a whitespace seperated list from a VCF file and returns a new VCF containing only these samples.
Credits
VCFtools is used for sample selection. The Variant Call Format and VCFtools, Petr Danecek, Adam Auton, Goncalo Abecasis, Cornelis A. Albers, Eric Banks, Mark A.
